scene_description_enriched: A lavish bouquet of blue flowers, accented with gold, is displayed in an ornate golden urn. The urn is supported by a blue pedestal and features decorative elements including cherubic figures. Surrounding the urn are decorative golden motifs of foliage, birds, and ribbons. Several small insects, including butterflies and a dragonfly, are depicted in flight around the floral arrangement. The entire composition is framed by a decorative border with gold dots on a dark background.
